strapiPost.title: SoNA Takes On The Fayetteville Jazz Collective In Battle Of The Bands
strapiPost.content:
SoNA's next performance, Battle of the Bands, will be a night of genre-defying music at Walton Arts Center on Saturday, Apr 8, at 7:30p.

  • Symphony swing: The orchestra will go head to head with the Fayetteville Jazz Collective, taking turns performing numbers and featuring several collaborative pieces along with guest vocalist Genine LaTrice Perez.
  • Listen closely: Come early at 6:30p to join Creative Conversations with SoNA Music Director Paul Haas and Fayetteville Jazz Collective master arranger Rick Salonen, and go behind the scenes with these Inside the Music interviews.

Get your tickets before they're gone HERE.
